an10.57:1.1: “Dasayima, bhikkhave, sanna bhavita bahulikata mahapphala honti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana.
an10.57:1.3: Aniccasanna, anattasanna, maranasanna, ahare patikulasanna, sabbaloke anabhiratasanna, atthikasanna, pulavakasanna, vinilakasanna, vicchiddakasanna, uddhumatakasanna—
an10.57:1.4: ima kho, bhikkhave, dasa sanna bhavita bahulikata mahapphala honti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana”ti.
